DOC.brief_summary: To compare safety efficacy coronary stenting everolimus-eluting stent ( Promus Element® ) biolimus-eluting stent biodegradable polymer ( Nobori® )
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Biolimus-eluting Biodegradable Polymer , Everolimus-eluting Sirolimus-eluting Coronary Stents
DOC.criteria: Significant coronary artery stenosis ( > 50 % visual estimate ) Stable angina , unstable angina , NonST elevation myocardial infarction ( NSTEMI ) document silent ischemia Patients eligible intracoronary stenting age ≥ 20 year old ST segment elevation myocardial infarction ( within 24 hour ) Low ejection fraction ( < 25 % ) Cardiogenic shock History bleeding diathesis know coagulopathy Limited lifeexpectancy ( less 1 year ) due combine serious disease Contraindication heparin , sirolimus , everolimus biolimus Contraindication aspirin clopidogrel Pregnancy
